caption.title: Nucleotide sequences of CHIKV 3’UTRs during adaptation to mosquito cells.
caption.p: Alignment of nucleotide sequences corresponding to the 3’UTR during adaptation experiments to C6/36 cells from Fig 3 is shown. Input Cbn-WT sequence is presented as reference. Numbers on the left correspond to those of the clones schematized in Fig 3C (left). Nucleotide changes are indicated in orange. Position 1 refers to the first position after the translation stop codon.
Click here for additional data file.
